metadata.title: Reading the Reset Control Flag Register (RESF)

sections.content:
Question:
Are there any precautions to take when reading the Reset Control Flag register (RESF)?
Answer:
When reading the value of the RESF register, it is cleared according to the specifications. If the RESF register is read in the startup routine, which is executed before the main function is executed after a reset, the reset cause cannot be confirmed if the RESF register is read again in the main function. Please read the RESF register in the main function without using the function generated by the code generation tool.
